rows.label: qst00100102_msg0001
rows.name:
Salvaging so cool... Rimurimu
could watch it all day...

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0002
rows.name:
Mo? Rimurimu feel like
he forgot something...

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0003
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Mo mo mo! Watch duty!

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0004
rows.name:
This thousandth time! Kebikebi
going to get so angry!

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0005
rows.name: Mo mo meeeeh!

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0006
rows.name:
Rimurimu watched salvaging
for so long he forgot his
tummy was rumbly-grumbly.

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0007
rows.name:
Uuuhhh, Rimurimu cannot move one
inch. Rimurimu shrivel up and die
here. Remember Rimurimu fondly...

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0008
rows.name:
Take pity on poor Rimurimu...
Someone help Rimurimu? Is no
kind good people around...?

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0009
rows.name:
If only Rimurimu could eat Cinnopon
Roll from Honeycomb Sweets, Rimurimu
would have energy to work...

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0010
rows.name:
Just one... One single,
small Cinnopon Roll...

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0101
rows.name:
All it take for energy of Rimurimu
to return is one Cinnopon Roll.
That too much to ask...?

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0102
rows.name:
They sold at Honeycomb Sweets
in Central Exchange, but Rimurimu
cannot walk single step...

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0201
rows.name: Mo mo! Mo mo mo!

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0202
rows.name:
You did it! It Cinnopon Roll!
Rimurimu eat up right now-

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0203
rows.name:
Wait, no! Not time for that!
Rimurimu have terrible problem!

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0204
rows.name:
While Rimurimu stand around dreaming
of Cinnopon Rolls, precious treasure
get stolen by Sly Krabble!

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0205
rows.name:
Very very important pendant
from Mom... Rimurimu must
get pendant back...

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0206
rows.name: Ah, Rimurimu have good idea!

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0207
rows.name:
Rimurimu will become salvager, and
salvage Sly Krabble! Foolproof!

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0208
rows.name:
Rimurimu start swimming
practice first thing tomorrow!

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0209
rows.name:
Friend help Rimurimu with swimming
practice?! Oh...just get pendant
back for Rimurimu instead?

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0210
rows.name:
Friend very good and kind to
get Rimurimu both Cinnopon
Roll and pendant as well.

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0211
rows.name:
Sly Krabble probably already
return to depths of Cloud Sea.

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0212
rows.name:
If Rimurimu get pendant, he can
work. Rimurimu save Cinnopon Roll
until pendant is returned!

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0301
rows.name:
Where Rimurimu's pendant?
Where Sly Krabble take it?

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0302
rows.name:
Rimurimu save Cinnopon Roll
until pendant is returned!

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0304
rows.name: Mmmmm! Cinnopon Roll so tasty...

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0305
rows.name:
Ah! Friends! R-Rimurimu was not
eating Cinnopon Roll! Rimurimu
only eat...half of Cinnopon Roll!

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0306
rows.name: ...Mo? Rimurimu's pendant?

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0307
rows.name:
Thank you! This Rimurimu's
special memories of Mom.

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0308
rows.name:
Mo! Rimurimu think too much
about pendant and forget to
relieve Kebikebi of watch duty!

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0309
rows.name:
Rimurimu not keep Kebikebi
waiting! Bye, friends!
